SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class MatchLog

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.MatchLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Remote
public class MatchLog extends Object implements Client
The MatchLog contains various methods to keep track and update statistics about a running match (connection/disconnections, choices made by the players, etc.) and display them on the server

  • Nested Class Summary
